name: Crazy Pen Tower Defense
description: - 1924 blocks - 2+ Insanity Pills - 750+ brain cells - #3 on TRENDING O_O Welcome to my FIRST PEN TOWER DEFENSE GAME! - Story: - Enemies are attacking Pen City! Defend Pen City with turrets and try to survive the attack! - - - Turbowarp = Less Lag: https://turbowarp.org/568164080 300+ loves for part 2 (will be waaaaaaaay better) This is really my first 100% pen game, and it is all my code and art! It took a lot of time and sanity, so I hope you would love, fave, and follow. A funny project on my ALT: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/570370173/ Featuring: - 100% pen! - Pointing towers! - Game speed buttons! - and more! How to play: - Click/tap the gray bar to open the shop - Hover over the towers for cost - Click and drag turrets to track (make sure it is not touching the brown track or any other turrets!) - Press the white and black play button to start a wave. - Press the white arrows to speed up or slow down the round. - Press D to add turret target lines - Love, fave, and follow! Credits: - @TimMcCool for Contest! - My followers and others for support! #all #games #crazy #pen #tower #defense #defence #tower_defense #tower_defence #MysticCr8tor
